import {
	decodeLog,
	decodeParameter,
	decodeParameters,
	encodeEventSignature,
	encodeFunctionCall,
	encodeFunctionSignature,
	encodeParameter,
	encodeParameters,
} from 'web3-eth-abi';

/**
 * The object for `web3.abi`
 */
export default {
	encodeEventSignature,
	encodeFunctionCall,
	encodeFunctionSignature,
	encodeParameter,
	encodeParameters,
	decodeParameter,
	decodeParameters,
	decodeLog,
};
/* eslint-disable header/header */ export const Web3PkgInfo = { version: '4.12.0' };
